Option.title: My Open Jobs
Option.name: MyOpenJobs
Option.restriction: ProjectManagerNumber = UserEmployeeNumber() and Closed = false and Template = false

Option.title: My Closed Jobs
Option.name: MyClosedJobs
Option.restriction: ProjectManagerNumber = UserEmployeeNumber() and Closed = true and Template = false

Option.title: Open Department Jobs
Option.name: DepartmentJobs
Option.restriction: if (UserEmployeeNumber() != '') then (LocationName = stringEnvVar('user.employeeinfo.EntityName') and Template = false and Closed = false) else false

Option.title: Invoicing
Option.name: Invoicing
Option.restriction: Closed = false and Template = false and NotInvoiceable = false

Error.template: Project Short Description, Local Language must be atleast 20 characters
Project Short Description, English must be atleast 20 characters and must differ from Local description

Page.title: Step 6/7 - New Sub Job (Step 5 skipped due to Project not being transferred to RamLink)
Step 5/6 - Payment Mode (Step 4 skipped due to Project not being transferred to RamLink)
Step 5/6 - Payment Mode (Step 4 skipped due to Project not being transferred to RamLink)
Create new job from existing job.

Reference.descriptionShadowTitle: Customer name, if you can not find the right customer use the customer 'TEMPORARY' until the correct customer is created.

Field.shadowTitle: Receiver of the Invoice

Field.title: Reference
Field.shadowTitle: Reference or order no. the customer wants to have stated eg. on the invoice.

Reference.descriptionShadowTitle: Customer name, if you can not find the right customer use the customer 'TEMPORARY' until the correct customer is created.

Field.title: Project Name (Local)
Field.shadowTitle: State the name of project in your local language - the name is used in reports, on invoices in Ramlink etc.

Field.title: Project Name (English)
Field.shadowTitle: State the name of project in English - the name is used in reports, on invoices in Ramlink etc.
Start date of the project
The Expected end date of the project.

Field.title: Project Name (Local)
Field.shadowTitle: State the name of project in your local language - the name is used in reports, on invoices in Ramlink etc.

Field.title: Project Name (English)
Field.shadowTitle: State the name of project in English - the name is used in reports, on invoices in Ramlink etc.
Start date of the project
The Expected end date of the project.

Field.title: Project Country
Field.shadowTitle: Country where the main part of the project is executed. In case of special tax issues contact your back office.

Field.title: City or Location
Field.shadowTitle: State here in which city(s) or other location the project is conducted.

Field.title: Transfer to RamLink
Field.shadowTitle: Should the project be a part of RamLink for reference and CV purpose (yes/no).
This text is transferred to RamLink as Reference text and CV description
This text is transferred to RamLink as Reference text and CV description

Field.title: Electronic Invoice Number
Field.shadowTitle: Only relevant for Denmark

Description.template: The information in this step is used when the customer requires an electronic invoice via EAN.
If your customer requires a paper invoice click next to skip this step.

Field.title: Other Information, Framework Contract
Field.shadowTitle: Number or text for specific details related to the framework contract type

Description.template: Your project is now ready to be created.
You may need to update your project with
Please press the 'Create' button to finalize creation

Field.shadowTitle: Blank for default job no.

Description.template: Please note if Main and Sub Projects are to be invoiced together as one invoice, the Project Type and Currency must be the same.
